medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed:
Inscribed in brown ink, lower right: 428
Inscribed in graphite, on verso lower right edge: L82 (loose)
Inscribed in graphite, on verso top right corner: $14 | 1936 | Nebehay [in Platt's hand]

makers.displaydate: 1527–1585; born Genoa, Italy; died Madrid, Spain

texts.textentryhtml: Gustav Nebehay, Vienna; purchased in 1936 by Dan Fellows Platt [Lugt 750a] (stamp lower right verso)
